name: Fighter King
description:
Different 3D round-based strategy game. Over 100 fighters all united, multi building system helps your fighter become stronger. Skills, gears, build up infinite possibility. Also have Guild War, Cross-Server PvP, Story Ranking and more features. Great scene with intense battle, fight to protect your homeland.

[Game Introduction]

--Story mode, server ranking--
Clear story mode to get rewards and Boost up your Power. Several plots and great world view, background story waiting you to discover. Server ranking of story mode, get the best title.

--100+ fighters to play--
In game, over 100 characters to play. Skills, abilities all not same. Skill matching line-ups help you to defeat stronger enemy and twist the battle. All fighters have different abilities, use strategy to build up your best line-up!

--Multiple build system--
Awakening, leveling up to boost your power. Gears, soul stone with different effects, matches different fighters. Find the best match to defeat your enemy.
